email_text.subject: Article Indexing Error
email_text.body:
An indexing error occurred while updating the article index.
The error message generated by the web service (if any): "{$error}"
This email was generated by Open Journal Systems' Lucene search plugin.
email_text.description: This email template is used to notify the technical contact of a journal that an error occurred during article indexing.

email_text.subject: Journal Indexing Error
email_text.body:
An indexing error occurred while indexing the journal "{$journalName}".
The error message generated by the web service (if any): "{$error}"
This email was generated by Open Journal Systems' Lucene search plugin.
email_text.description: This email template is used to notify the technical contact of a journal that an error occurred during journal indexing.

email_text.subject: Journal Search Service Error
email_text.body:
An error occurred while someone tried to search the installation "{$siteName}".
The error message generated by the web service (if any): "{$error}"
This email was generated by Open Journal Systems' Lucene search plugin.
email_text.description: This email template is used to notify the technical contact of a journal that an error occurred while trying to access the Solr search service.
